__e: Now, why don't you help me finish packing and then be a dear and come downstairs in time to see us off.
"If you're very, very good, and promise to tell no lies, "then you will become a real, live boy.
Oh, and, Michael, I need you to be my sweetie... and cook dinner tonight.
So now I have to be all nice to him and shit.
